page.title: 11Epworth County Primary.
page.content: We have one Primary School in our village called Epworth County Primary. It is a very modern open plan school and has only been open for about three years. Prior to this there were two primary schools in the village both of which were over 100 years old. The new school has approximately 270 children on roll and is divided into four units. Units 1 and 2 are for infants and reception children, Unit 3 for 1st and 2nd year juniors and Unit 4 for 3rd and 4th year juniors. The library, sports equipment and toilet facilities are all better than they were at the previous schools. The atmosphere is very friendly and warm. It is definetely warmer in winter!
